name: Vaporeon
description: The Bubble Jet Pokémon. Its cell structure is similar to water molecules. It melts into the water and becomes invisible.

abilities.name: Water Absorb
abilities.description: This Pokémon takes no damage from water or water-type attacks. Instead, half of any water damage done is absorbed, restoring the Pokémon's HP.

abilities.name: Hydration
abilities.description: This Pokémon is unaffected by negative status ailments in water or during rainy conditions.
